auth.displayNameRequirements: Your user name must only include letters, numbers, -, or _ and can be no longer than 20 characters.

emailVerification.explanation: Please click the link we sent you to {{email}}.
emailVerification.welcomeVerified: Welcome at macht.sprache., your Email has been verified. Click continue to get to the main page.

errors.name-already-in-use: This user name is not available.
errors.email-already-in-use: The email address is already connected to another account.
errors.weak-password: Your password should consist of at least 6 characters.

register.title: Sign Up
register.intro: The user name will be public. You are free to decide whether you want to appear under a pseudonym or under your real name, and if so, with which identity you will be recognized.
register.termsAndPrivacy: By registering you agree to our <TermsLink>terms</TermsLink> and <PrivacyLink>privacy policy</PrivacyLink>.

passwordReset.heading: Choose a new password
passwordReset.requestExplanation: Enter the email address you signed up with and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
passwordReset.requestSuccessExplanation: If you had an account for {{email}} we sent you a link to reset your password.

activation.heading: Activation Required
activation.explanation: Almost there! We still need to activate your account. We'll send you an email when you can start using it.

term.addTermDescription: Add a term for which you would like to discuss possible translations.
term.registerToAdd: To add a term, please <LoginLink>log in</LoginLink> or <SignUpLink>sign up</SignUpLink>.
term.deleteExplanation: Are you sure you want to delete this term? This cannot be undone!

translation.registerToAdd: To add a translation, please <LoginLink>log in</LoginLink> or <SignUpLink>sign up</SignUpLink>.
translation.empty: There are no translations for <TermWithLang>{{term}}</TermWithLang> yet. Add one:
translation.addTranslation: Add a translation for <Term>{{term}}</Term> that you would like to discuss.
translation.deleteExplanation: Are you sure you want to delete this translation? This cannot be undone!

mediaSearch.ariaDescription: When results are available, use up and down arrow keys to select them. Press enter to confirm selection.

translationExample.empty: There are no examples for <Term /> translated as <Translation /> yet.
translationExample.example: e.g. a book, a website, or a movie
translationExample.add: Add an example for this translation: <Term>{{term}}</Term> → <Translation>{{translation}}</Translation>

type.label: Type
type.description: Select the type of source you want to add:

BOOK.description: Select the books you want to add:
BOOK.searchOriginal: Search by the title of the original book
BOOK.searchTranslation: Search by the title of the translated book

MOVIE.description: Select the movies you want to add:
MOVIE.searchOriginal: Search by the title of the original movie
MOVIE.searchTranslation: Search by the title of the translated movie

WEBPAGE.description: Select the websites you want to add:
WEBPAGE.searchOriginal: Paste the URL of the original website
WEBPAGE.searchTranslation: Paste the URL of the translated website

translationExample.registerToAdd: To add a translation, please <LoginLink>log in</LoginLink> or <SignUpLink>sign up</SignUpLink>.
translationExample.translationListNoExample: There is no example yet. Click <Link>here</Link> to add one.

rating.heading: Usage
rating.rangeInputLabel: How often would you use "{{term}}"? On a scale of {{from}} to {{to}}.
rating.dragToSet: Drag the orange dot to set your usage.
rating.overlayHeading: How often would you translate <Term>{{term}}</Term> as <Translation>{{translation}}</Translation>?

comment.registerToAdd: To comment, please <LoginLink>log in</LoginLink> or <SignUpLink>sign up</SignUpLink>.
comment.deleteExplanation: Are you sure you want to delete this comment? This cannot be undone.

notFound.heading: Page not found
notFound.paragraph: This page does not exist. <Link>Take me home</Link>.

home.signUpPreLaunch: Launch on March 14th – Sign up already!
home.signUpPreLaunchDescription: Sign up here to create an account on macht.sprache. and to get notified for the launch event. Optionally, you can also sign up for the poco.lit.-newsletter.
home.termsOfTheWeekDescription: Every week we pick different terms to focus on. This week:
home.claim: Platform to collect and discuss sensitive terms and their translations

userPage.title: User profile of
userPage.hideRedactedDescription: Sensitive terms: By default, macht.sprache. hides obviously offensive terms (e.g. n***o). If you would prefer to see them for the sake of clarity, you can disable this feature here.
userPage.addBio: You can add a little bio about yourself <AddDescription>here</AddDescription>
userPage.addSocial: Click the button below to add some social media profiles

contentWarning.title: Content Warning
contentWarning.warning: On macht.sprache., we discuss politically sensitive terminology. With a code of conduct and some terms that are not written out due to their discriminatory content, we try to make macht.sprache. a constructive place for learning and discussion. Nevertheless, it could happen that you are confronted with hurtful language on the platform.
